# Preliminary analysis {#prelim}

```{r setup, include = FALSE, cache = FALSE}

# Read in data from Load_data.R in scripts folder

read_chunk(here("scripts", "Load_data.R"))
```

```{r LST-count, data, echo = FALSE}
# Plot asthma rate by LST, not including rows with NAs
all.levels %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  filter(asthma.rate > 0) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(LST, asthma.rate)) +
  geom_bin2d() 
```

```{r min-count, data, echo = FALSE}
all.levels %>% 
  filter(asthma.rate > 0) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(pct.min, asthma.rate)) +
  geom_bin2d() 
```
